scripts.rustdocs:publish: cargo bump patch && git add .. && git commit -m 'Bump docs version' && cargo publish
scripts.deploy: anchor build && solana program deploy --max-len 10000000 --url devnet -k ~/sol-keys/nautBp55wm3oQSCu6278BmXg1kk5UfLwsuPnt3KUSkX.json target/deploy/nftoken.so
scripts.deploy:mainnet: anchor build && solana program deploy --max-len 10000000 --url mainnet-beta -k ~/sol-keys/nautBp55wm3oQSCu6278BmXg1kk5UfLwsuPnt3KUSkX.json target/deploy/nftoken.so
